title: Software License & Activation
description: Resolving product activation errors for Windows, Office, and other licensed software.

steps.title: Check Login Account
steps.instruction: For Office 365: Open an app (e.g., Word), go to File > Account. Ensure you are signed in with your work email address.

steps.title: Connect to VPN/Network
steps.instruction: Enterprise licenses often require connection to the company network (KMS). Connect to VPN and wait 15-30 minutes.

steps.title: Update License
steps.instruction: In Key Management (OS settings) or App Account settings, look for an 'Update License' or 'Fix Me' button.

steps.title: Restart System
steps.instruction: Sometimes background licensing services get stuck. A full restart can refresh these services.

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If activation fails, raise a ticket with: Screenshot of the activation error, Software Name, and your PC Asset ID.
